reviewText: I used to have a copy of this movie. I found it for around $5 at our local Wal-Mart. It was in one of those discount bins. I actually love this movie. Yes it's a little cheesy and dated but that's all part of the appeal, along with the fact that it takes place on a tropical island for a change. Anyway to make a long story short- I ended up giving away my copy thinking I'd just get another one. WRONG! Apparently it's out of print. I looked everywhere. And now sellers on Amazon are asking for $208.00 ? I don't think I'll be getting this back into my collection anytime soon sorry to say. Waiting for the price to drop. Perhaps it will be available again for a lower price. Just have to wait and see. Great movie but not at that price.
It was just as good as I remembered.
Excellent condition.  Was a birthday gift for a  fellow Godzilla fan.  Hard to find the movies on vhs.  Will definitely buy more.
I thought I ordered a dvd.  I was surprised when a vhs showed up.  Cost me another $20 to transfer the vhs to dvd
I love this movie, I just wish I could find it on DVD or blue ray like every other old movie.

This movie is hysterical.  The relationship between Godzilla and his adopted son is touching and very monster-like.  The other creatures are a bit gross to watch, but I loved Godzilla giving his son tough love.  C'mon-man up and assert your atomic breath kid!

I liked it great movie lots of great memories to watch from the 60's
I hope everyone enjoys this movie as much as I did
